title: Construction of an electrochemical pH sensor using one-pot synthesis of a molybdenum diselenide/nitrogen doped graphene oxide screen-printed electrode
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14616-14623
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01708K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sujittra Poorahong, Wipawee Oin, Saowaluk Buapoon, Supinya Nijpanich, David J. Harding, Mohamed Siaj
In this study, a one-pot synthesis of a molybdenum diselenide/nitrogen-doped graphene oxide (MoSe2/NGO) composite was demonstrated and used for the fabrication of an electrochemical pH sensor.
